Thunderstorm: Whaddaya mean don't trust my descendants? The last thing 
I knew was my ship being destroyed by those slagging decepticons and 
me being ejected by.... (He chokes from the memories brought back) 
Anyways, in my own mind, I have no descendant yet! By A3, I don't even 
know if the war is over. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Rhesus: Hey mustex you think you can mount that last thruster in the
